snippet: The commission said Wet Seal managers “stated they wanted employees who had the ‘Armani look, were white, had blue eyes, thin and blond in order to be profitable.’ ”
abstract: Equal Employment Opportunity Commission says Wet Seal, nationwide apparel retailer for young women, illegally discriminated against former store manager Nicole Cogdell after company executive complained about too many black employees at manager's Pennsylvania store.
lead_paragraph: The commission said Wet Seal managers “stated they wanted employees who had the ‘Armani look, were white, had blue eyes, thin and blond in order to be profitable.’ ”

headline.seo: E.E.O.C. Finds Race Bias In Firing at Wet Seal Store
headline.main: E.E.O.C. Finds Race Bias in Firing at Wet Seal Store
headline.print_headline: E.E.O.C. Finds Race Bias In Firing at Wet Seal Store
